BH-016. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet
BH-016. Antique tri-fold expandable around a metal grommet

Vase shape when closed. Color photograph of a formal flower arrangement with a black background. This seems to be a printer's sample; Printer: U.O. Colson Company, Paris, Illinois. Stamped "For Minnows, Worms, and Accessories, call AT 5908 Troost."
